description: Joke on literal interpretation of 'being Frank'.
title: Name Game
n_1: Tom and Frank chat casually in a park.
c1_1: Everyone says I should be more like you.
n_2: Tom ponders this, scratching his head.
c1_2: But isn't that a bit hard?
c2_2: Why? Just be honest and straightforward.
c1_3: But I'd need a new ID for that!
c2_3: Why on earth would you need that?
n_4: Tom grins, ready to deliver his punchline.
c1_4: To be Frank, I'd have to change my name!
c2_4: Oh, I see what you did there!
